Quirks: Won't scan weapons.
Lost a powerful device. Still not over it.
Does not want to be on this mission.
Recently had their memory wiped.
Owes a favor to someone/something nearby.
Obsessed with fine art or fashion.
Not here to make friends.
Aversion to dirt, grime, and goo.
Aversion to cramped spaces.
Aversion to heights.
Reluctant to spend multiples of 3.
Reluctant to spend multiples of 4.
Reluctant to spend multiples of 5.
Refuses to incur negative Overpower.
Believes everything they hear.
Doesn't consider art to be a treasure.
Hates backtracking.
Dead bodies make them nervous.
Avoids scanning treasures of a certain color.
Insists on wearing any hats they find.
Convinced they need 8 hours of sleep per day.
Convinced they need to drink clean water every day.
Convinced they need to eat a hearty meal each day.
Emits a constant high-pitched tone.
Their devices make loud noises when used.
Will try to adopt a pet.
A leaky panel leaves trails of battery acid.
Driven to complete every area.

Devices.Name: Lava Moat
Devices.Description: Emit a wave of melting plasma.

Devices.Name: Drill Furnace
Devices.Description: Spinning teeth deposit material into mouth furnace.

Devices.Name: Spectral Taster
Devices.Description: “Taste” detailed information from anything placed near your mouth.

Devices.Name: Glue Bubble
Devices.Description: Spray a target with sticky glue that quickly hardens.

Devices.Name: Chemical Composer
Devices.Description: Create a concoction for any situation.

Movement.Name: Bubble Lift
Movement.Description: Grow floating bubbles that protect and elevate.
